text: Topla Primary School (Bengali: টোপলা প্রাইমারী স্কুল) is an old and heritage primary school of Nadia district, in the state of West Bengal, India. It is situated at Topla village, under Thanapara police station in Nadia. == History == This school was established in the year1901. Topla Primary School is one of the oldest primary school of the district which was started by the British Government. As of 2017, the school was under the Karimpur New Circle, of Nadia District District Inspector of School (Primary) office. ==References== Category:Schools in Nadia district Category:Schools in Colonial India Category:Primary schools in West Bengal
title: Topla Primary School
